long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say you're building a powerpoint presentation, and need to search for several different images, it can be painful to go one at a time.  This extension lets you put your searches as a comma separated list and then open them in different tabs with a single click.
